description: Provides the details that are necessary to update an ID mapping table.

parameters.name: idMappingTableIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the ID mapping table that you want to update.

parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the membership that contains the ID mapping table that you want to update.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: inputReferenceConfig
nested_items.description: The input reference configuration for the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: inputReferenceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the referenced resource in Entity Resolution. Valid values are ID mapping workflow ARNs.

nested_items.name: manageResourcePolicies
nested_items.description: When TRUE, Clean Rooms manages permissions for the ID mapping table resource.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the membership resource for the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the membership resource for the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the collaboration that contains this ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the collaboration that contains this ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time at which the ID mapping table was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent time at which the ID mapping table was updated.

nested_items.name: inputReferenceProperties
nested_items.description: The input reference properties for the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: idMappingTableInputSource
nested_items.description: The input source of the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: idNamespaceAssociationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the ID namespace association.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the input source of the ID mapping table.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services KMS key.
